article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Global Hawk Communications Spares
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., San Diego, Calif., was awarded a $7,902,648 delivery order (0001) to firm-fixed-price contract (F8620-13-G-0001) for Global Hawk spares. The contract award is for ground segment communications spares. This contract will provide spares for ground and communications systems to help ensure mission success. The Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
